programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian is haunted by the tragic events that transpired in Barrio Sto. Francisco and confronts Franco for leading the attack on the small town. However, Tiago defends Franco and reveals his reason for asking him to do it. Meanwhile, Marcial and his team learn that Rhian was in Barrio Sto. Francisco before the attack.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Unable to do anything to help save their respective daughters, Romina and Daniela can only pray. Robert refuses to adhere to the kidnappersâ€™ demands. As he heads out to deliver the ransom money in exchange for Cassie and Marga, he discreetly conspires with his allies to plot against the criminals. However, Alvin's sudden appearance jeopardizes the success of his plans. Will the Mondragon patriarch be able to bring Cassie and Marga back to safety and come back alive?

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After seeing Cassie confront Robert for the truth, Romina is left with no choice but to recount her bitter past. This deeply upsets Marga, who is being plagued by guilt after accidentally spilling the truth to Cassie. Daniela, on the other hand, begins to suspect Alvin for orchestrating the abduction. Meanwhile, Hector and Alvin continue their plan to exact revenge on Robert. Carlos also questions Daniela over the unexplained withdrawals from their bank account.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Following an appalling incident with her drunkard uncle, Dodong, Aryann elopes with her boyfriend Waldo, who her family disapproves of. However, when Dodong tries to stop her, Waldo steps in and accidently kills him.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Desperate to get Waldo out of prison, Aryann is forced to works as a call girl to fund his case. She soon meets Tristan, a rich businessman who offers to help her out of her predicament.

programme.title: Starting Over Again
programme.desc: When Ginny reunites with her ex-boyfriend after receiving an email he wrote and sent four years ago, she takes this as a sign to get back together with him despite the pains of the past.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya and Domeng attend to Asyong and Unyo as the two move into their home. Meanwhile, thinking that the Lamostes have plotted against Gabriel's life, Carolina confronts and assaults Jean. Enraged for meddling with his plans, Jacob then beats Roman.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: An ex-boxer falls in love with a blind woman who is set to undergo surgery to restore her sight.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding with Ali causes Iris to fall into a sulk. Ali then tries to make it up to her by spending time with Iris on a bike tour around the city. Meanwhile, seeing Basti and Ali's unusual closeness, Iris becomes suspicious of Basti's sexual orientation.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris continues to consider the possibility that Basti is gay. When the rumor spreads and reaches him, a fed-up Ali confronts Iris and breaks up with her. Later, Basti is stunned to hear his own heartbeat while comforting Iris.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Isabelle and the other survivors of Barrio Sto. Francisco mourn their fallen neighbors. They later hold a funeral and discuss where they will relocate. Meanwhile, Franco gets caught in a shootout between the rebels and the military. Much to the dismay of Rhian, some of the children who joined the rebels were injured in the encounter.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Franco tails Rhian to confirm his hunch about her. However, Rhian senses that he is following her on her way to Isabelle and Elai's location. Wanting to protect the two, Rhian goes out of her way to keep them from Franco. Meanwhile, Jessie tries to find out what Rhian is hiding. Elsewhere, Tiago offers to help Corazon solve Arabella's case.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela finds herself in a bind after Carlos discovers her suspicious transactions. Afraid to be exposed, she scrambles to find a way to cover up her secrets. Meanwhile, the kidnapper's call keeps haunting Romina and triggers her most painful memories. Instead of cowering in fear, she finally decides to seek the justice she truly deserves. Cassie struggles to move on from the traumatic events that happened to her and her family as Marga continues to give her a hard time.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert decides to throw a birthday party once again for Cassie. Daniela disapproves and convinces her father to host a party for Marga instead, insisting that her daughter is the real Mondragon. In order to be fair and equal, Robert chooses to hold a double birthday celebration for the girls. Marga rejects this and becomes jealous of Cassie for taking the spotlight away from her. The tension between Romina and Daniela intensifies.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: A year after Waldo's disappearance at sea, Aryann crosses paths with Tristan as she begins a new life in Manila. Unbeknownst to her, Waldo is still alive.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Fate plays its card when Aryann unexpectedly meets Waldo, who turns out to be Tristan's scholar. Later, Tristan decides to take his relationship with Aryann to the next level.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: An ex-boxer falls in love with a blind woman who is set to undergo surgery to restore her sight.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robertâ€™s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistantâ€™s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Rominaâ€™s current boyfriend.
